website_summaries.verdict: We love this bike's striking looks and pleasant ride. Although pricey, it's worth considering for any man who wants a bike that looks as smooth as it rides.
pros: Features attractive looks and comes in several colors including bright orange
Available in choice of 1, 3, or 7 speeds
cons: Seat isn't as easy to adjust as the handlebars, and tends to slip out of position
Some bikes arrived with missing parts
Most expensive cruiser on our list

customer_reviews.title: I sent mine back
customer_reviews.text: It looked so cool in the pictures and had some great reviews. I sent mine back. It was easy to put together, took about 15 minutes total. I pumped up the tires and went of r a ride. The ride lasted about 10 minutes. The seat wasn't able to remain in a stationary position, so I cranked down on the nut to tighten it. That didn't help. Every time I say on the seat, it tilted all the way back, not a fun experience as a grown man, in fact it made me upset. So I took another 15 minutes and put it back in the box and UPS came to take it back the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Perfect

customer_reviews.title: a little dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Only reason this is not a 1 star review is because the frame is actually really nice but... The seat kept tilting no matter what i tried until i got a new adapter for it. One peddle broke within like two and a half weeks of light use in less than 15 miles. I never got off the seat to get more power when riding either. Finally the front wheel had a SEVERE wobble when it arrived. I did what i could to make it at least rideable. Disappointed with the quality of everything but the handle bar and frame
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my teenage son. It was really easy to throw together, and It's a very eye catching bike with people constantly complimenting and asking where we got it. We love it. My son is 14 and we both think this is one of the best things I've ever bought him...Call of Duty is on the back burner right now.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy the Bull

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bike I guess!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know a whole lot about bikes, but I guess this is a pretty good one. Be double sure not to skip the part of the instructions that talk about adjusting the brakes! Showing up at a turn at the bottom of a hill at 30mph or so is a rotten time to study why you ain't got no brakes. Also, the bike didn't come with instructions on how to ride it. But, I'm not dead yet, my nearest neighbor is getting pretty good at calling 911, and I'll keep working at it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cool, and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was a big ticket item as we want this bike to serve as a grown-up bike for my son. I was nervous about assembly as I've never done it before, but it really does come 85% assembled and there were videos online as well. We were delightfully surprised at how easy it was to put together. One brake line was damaged in shipping, but easily resolved with a free replacement by contacting customer service. Our son has always been more of a scooter kid, but this bike has him riding regularly and occasionally even letting us (his parents) borrow it for a spin. Bonus: the seat is large and cushy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Danzinger

customer_reviews.title: All show and no go!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone to my local bike shop 3 times to try to make this bike's gears run smoothly (gears click, make noise and rub), but the mechanic has given up, as he says the parts are simply too cheap to be fixed - I would need to replace all of my gears and crank shaft - not worth it! The bike does look nice, although it's very heavy, but is very cheaply made and way too expensive for what you're getting. I'm very disappointed! I spent lots of time and money to get this bike fixed, but I'm going to return it. I'm very surprised that no one has had these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Bootman

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, Sexy, Simple. Buy one, you won't be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: A smooth classic look and feel. Simple construction, easy to assemble and all around a bitchn cruiser! Some assembly is required, they supply the tools you need. I found that I had to ride the bike a little and re-adjust the seat and handle bars to my liking. Wish they had the option to order fenders with this one, but not on Amazon. So I purchased the fender kit directly from SixThreeZero.com for $29.99 w/free shipping. Just in time for summer and what a beautiful bike. Thank you SixThreeZero for making a solid low cost sexy cruiser.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Super Happy !
customer_reviews.text: First of all the assembly took no more than 10-15 minutes. Then simply aired up the tires and off I went. I’ve put probably 100 miles on the bike so far and not had an issue, .........the three speed shifter is sweet
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different brand
customer_reviews.text: 2 major problems during assembly. the tube connecting the seat to the bike wouldn't fit. got stuck and wouldn't move at all. I did lube it as per instructions prior to insertion. The ring on one of the reflectors was too small as well. I couldn't return it since the bike wouldn't fit into the box anymore after the tube got stuck so I had to order various parts online and spend a day fixing my BRAND new bike. Sawing and drilling wasn't what I had in mind when I bought it. It truly robbed me of the excitement of riding a brand new bike the same day I got it. never again.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel M Agababov

customer_reviews.title: Fine enough given the price I guess
customer_reviews.text: Fine enough given the price I guess. It shipped with a broken pedal and when I push down on the handle bars they slip down no matter how hard I tighten the bolt. They replaced the pedal eventually but we kind of missed the window of nice weather in Phoenix and by the time the new pedal came, it was too hot to ride regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable bicycle I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.text: By far the best bicycle I have ever purchased. I bought this bike for comfort. Working in the construction business all my life, I needed a bike where I could sit up straight so there was no strain on my back. This bike did the trick. I bought the three speed which I’m very happy with. The gears shift smoothly. I really like the wider style seat, it’s very comfortable. I’ve added a rear seat post rack, a drink holder for my coffee, and a cell phone holder. I’ve rode my bike 3-4 times a week after work since I bought it. I’m still very very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Ware

customer_reviews.title: Build a bike in 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a box of parts with a janky bike inside. Instead it arrived with really good directions and everything has been very good quality. The online videos help with assembly. I didn't watch then till after a few rides, it's pretty self explanatory. The best part of the bike is that after riding it all summer long I am still happy with the bike. I would buy again or recommend to a friend. Good bike.
customer_reviews.author: Bravo Golf

customer_reviews.title: A solid ride with a slick look.
customer_reviews.text: This bike has seriously been so on point! I bought it for many reasons, one was to ride it all week at Burning Man and then return to SF and ride it daily to and from work, it has seriously held up so well, all the components on it are metal compared to the cheaper bikes that break after 10 miles or so. Im super happy with this purchase and would totally recommend this. The only thing I still haven't been able to tighten down enough without it slipping is the seat... You need some sort of super human grip to tighten it.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Frohne

customer_reviews.title: Broken spokes, scratched or rubbed paint, less than par welds on the frame.
customer_reviews.text: Two broken spokes and three bent on front rim. Paint knocked off the top of the gooseneck and a few other places on the frame. Lots of slag rolling around in the frame tubes. It's junk! I can fix all the other stuff but the slag from the frame welds is so noisy when you hit even a pebble in the road. It really sounds awful! That I can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: SkyNet Global

customer_reviews.title: Best cruiser available
customer_reviews.text: I had a very lengthy, very thorough review types but Amazon rejected it, who knows why. I have two of these and plan to buy a third. I wouldn't spend $1400 on a bike if it was unreliable or rode poorly. Simple as that.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the $$$ expect some issues
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bike. It is pretty awesome for the cost! Comfortable and rides nice. It has some issues though. The pedals are terrible. Mine literally broke on the first ride. Luckily not much else can break on this bike as it is pretty simple. Plan on new pedals immediately and a wheel true after a few rides (spokes were pretty loose).
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: After first ride...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Negatives that I have found so far: 1. Made in China 2. Came with a few blemishes on the paint from packaging 3. Instructions for assembly are terrible 4. Seat is pretty stiff 5. Stickers and emblems are cheesy and should be removed 6. Seat adjustment needs Allen wrench and cannot be changed on the fly. Other than these things seems pretty good after the first ride.
customer_reviews.author: EMG

customer_reviews.title: Best for a tall person with long legs because of ...
customer_reviews.text: A heavy, "old-mans" bike, but I can sit up in a normal sitting position which might save your back. Best for a tall person with long legs because of the size. Really difficult to pedal uphill, so don't buy for hilly terrain. Otherwise a good workout on a slow pace.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Studmobile!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so my husband is 6' 10" and was tired of trying to lift his leg over a 25 in frame...it's hard! Not to mention he looked ridiculous on the mountain bike or 10 speeds. This bike is for the cool man. I'm so happy we can bike as a family. That's all we needed the bike for is family outings and fun. He striped all the decals off and left it matte black. My cool man needed this cool bike! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike
customer_reviews.text: Best bike I’ve ever owned. Seamless assembly. I’m 6’1” and the barrel fits me perfect and rides smooth. The 3 speed version allows me to navigate the hills around our house with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina R. Brechbiel

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this bike! It functions flawlessly out of the box. VERY easy to assemble and only takes half hour or less. Now...the ride. The cruiser rides like a dream and feels really solid underneath you. Im on the heavy side and it feels very capable of supporting me, yet is light as a feather! Looks...this ride cant be beat in appearance....even my 13 year old son cant keep his eyes OR hands off it. I was skeptical about dropping 4 large for a bike....I feel i got everything i paid for. No trips to the bike shop for adjustments to be able to ride. TOTALLY RECOMMEND!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LaDenis

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking - Might not be ideal for 6'3" person
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to assemble and structurally sound. I did have some challenges with the pedal location as it just felt like vs. the seat position it felt like I was riding on my heals.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Cusick

customer_reviews.title: The bike is great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: The bike is great for the beach!! Looks good and is a little different from other beach cruisers, which I like. Had some initial stiffness and squeaking in the seat but support with bike gave great recommendations and I fixed with no issue. Maybe a little pricer than other bikes out there but with the gear shift and all black finish, I think it was worth the extra cost. Definitely recommend the sixthreezero.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Sixthreezero bikes are great!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these bikes. We bought several for the family 6 months ago and they are great. Easy to assemble, fun colors for cruising, smooth and with constant use we've had no issues at all. People comment on them all the time. Great product that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nicki c

customer_reviews.title: An ok bike
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike sight unseen, and if I could do it over again I would have chosen another option. It gets me from point A to B in the small shore town I reside, outside of that, the seat and chain cover squeak and rattle, the gears are ok, but don't shift without a lot of noise. If the bike were $199.00 it would be a good deal, but for 300.00 spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Epic Bike ! Thank you @SixThreeZero !
customer_reviews.text: I received the bike, first impression is great quality product,not too heavy and good packaging. Arrived safe with no issues. The bike was easy to assemble too, easy visual instructions provided. The bike rides great too ! very comfortable positioning, tall and responsive breaks. Overall GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.author: jovany

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is the bees knees. It takes about 30 minutes to put together. The bike is clearly made well and the seat is pretty comfortable. After I got it together, I took it around the block for a ride and was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to get up to speed. You buy this bike if you want something that will last a long time and look great. Just threw a basket on the front end to tote my gear to the beach. I will be enjoying this one for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Nice styling, build quality is ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike. Love the styling and the longer frame setup. Assembly was simple. Bikes were packed well. 4 stars only because the quality is decent, but not great. I have a Trek and a Nirve cruiser that are both of much higher build quality.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for older rider
customer_reviews.text: Bought based on older person amazon recommendation. I am 65. I now bike on non pavement road in front of my home. Get the 7 speed for sure. Very comfortable. Sit on it nice, arms comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shakey Bob

customer_reviews.title: I Love sixthreezero!
customer_reviews.text: I started out by buying a sixthreezero for my girlfriend for our anniversary. It was easy to put together and a beautiful bike. I am by no means good at following instructions, but I was easily able to assemble the bike from the instructional video on Beach Bikes website. SO naturally I bought the bike for myself too! It was, again, shipped safely and was easy to put together. You will never stop getting compliments about the bike. Sometimes I wish I had bought the 3-speed, but I am 100% satisfied with the quality and overall bike aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Conner J

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seat, upright position
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. Not a road racer but just right for me. Comfortable seat, upright position. If you live in a windy area, expect to pedal hard in first gear into the wind; but downwind is "Stylin". The only thing to get used to is the coaster brakes. But they are simple and are just like the bike you had when you were a kid! If you want to cruise around it is perfect. TT
customer_reviews.author: TommyTeriffic

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent quality bike, the pedals absolutely fell apart after two rides to the beach and the frame itself needs constant adjusting so I think you get what you pay for but other than that...for the price the availability online I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RKP

customer_reviews.title: This particular bike was really easy to put together and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Went to there retail shop a week before to test out the bikes. Had some money on an Amazon gift card so my wife and I purchased a cruiser each. This particular bike was really easy to put together and looks great. I'm actually surprised how easy it is to pedal as opposed to the beach cruisers I had growing up. And with it's simple design it is so easy to throw on the bike rack and go. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the black out look !! Very comfortable too !!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his bike .. I bought this as a gift .. pretty nice for the cool guy !! Very comfortable ride too !!
customer_reviews.author: Cthomas

customer_reviews.title: Big guy in a sixthreezero!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it so I could ride with my kids I’m 6 fit tall and 300 lbs and it rides wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. Regalado

customer_reviews.title: the worst Amazon purchase I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS BIKE. I got a flat tire on my first ride and the rear forks of the bike bent!! I was able to bend the forks back together with my HANDS. This bike is very cheaply made. Spend the extra money and get something that won't fall apart on you. Without a doubt, the worst Amazon purchase I've ever made. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Delivered in great shape front rim wasn't quite true but easy fix ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in great shape front rim wasn't quite true but easy fix with spoke wrench. I think it's a cool bike and rides nice. And assembly was easy. Even came with some tools and touch up paint.
customer_reviews.author: Paul_bellissimo

customer_reviews.title: A great bike and an even greater Customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: The bikes have a really nice design,a durable frame and of great quality.Bery easy to assemble. Customer service at the company(a gentelman called Mat) was very professional and helpful.He helped me resolve an issue with my purchase even though it wasn't their fault. I am a loyal customer for life . Outstanding product ,staff and customer service. A+ Company and a pleasure to do buisness with! I highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: W.F BARACATS

customer_reviews.title: Great design, slower than I expected but for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great design, slower than I expected but for the fashionable look I am very satisfied. It’s also comfortable a great way to commute to work for short distances. I’m 6”4 and I weigh 220lbs and the frame fits me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Haakan Mjaanes

customer_reviews.title: SixThreeZero In The Barrel. Rock On W Your Bad Selves!
customer_reviews.text: Standard free delivery was going to be fast and then it arrived a day EARLY. Gotta love that. Assembly was super easy. Was on the road for my test ride in about an hour. Rides like a dream. Getting ready to take this cruiser out to the VaBeach boardwalk where it will definitely be the coolest cruiser at the beach. Thanks SixThreeZero for making a big kid happy with such a super-cool and well-engineered product. You guys are at the top of the cycling business. Oh yeah, don't let me forget your awesome website. From shopping to assembly your videos were the best. Rock on w your bad selves.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Best Cruiser for TALL folks!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cruiser bike for taller or longer legged men OR women. As a taller female, I bought this bike - and its a great cruiser in size, style, and comfort. I recommend it GREATLY for anyone looking for a cool bike, who doesn't want their knees hitting their chins!
customer_reviews.author: LC13

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like everything is made for "average" sized people. If you are over 6 feet tall and are tired of riding with your butt up in the air with too much weight shifted forward to your hands and arms on the handlebars...this bike will feel great. I have been on so many bicycles over the years and this is the first one that feels "right." Solid, stylish, simple, unique, comfortable...great bicycle!
customer_reviews.author: P. Morton

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know they still made bikes like this. Very solid
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know they still made bikes like this. Very solid, easy to put together and simple enough in construction not to have to worry about complexity gumming up the works. The instructions were simple; it took about 1/2 hour from opening to pedaling.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Holland

customer_reviews.title: Love it but packaging was horrible
customer_reviews.text: Love it but packaging was horrible. Parts of the bike were protruding through the cardboard. I was afraid that the bike would be bent and scratched up. Luckily, just a couple of minor scratched on the rear axle nut. The plastic protector was not connected. Overall, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Buff@54

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this bike
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Assembled at a leisurely pace in about an hour. I just needed two 1/2" wrenches to tighten the seat properly. I assembled the rest with the tools provided. Very sturdy bike. Rides nice and looks great! I have received several compliments on its looks. That being said, I won't be leaving it sit out in the yard unattended ;) Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Seelye

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike! Very well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike! Very well made and sturdy. It took me less than an hour to put mine and my wifes together. The only down fall is the foot pedals. Mine broke on the third ride. I suggest upgrading the pedals. If it wasn't for that I definitely would give this bike 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: F.Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Holly Guacamole, what a bike!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I've rode some rad cruisers before but this takes the cake. I did tones of research on what to get for my next cruiser and finally decided because I liked that it was built for taller people. I'm 6.3 and my other cruiser is a 29er. I thought going down to 26's would take away from the comfort, but the way this frame is built makes it even more comfortable. And it's way better quality than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bikes!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bike I have purchased within a 4 month span. One for her and one for myself. Both bikes are amazing. The quality is next level and is something that is going to hold up for a long time. Well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Brad R

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Bike and Cruiser.
customer_reviews.text: I am a large frame 6'2" guy and this bike is very comfortable for me to ride regarding the seat, upright posture, wide handlebars and very easy and smooth shift mechanism. The brakes are awesome and the wide tires make this easy to ride along the beach too. I very strongly recommend this as a beach or casual cruiser.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Buyer

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable bike I've ever owned! My wife cant keep up.....so I had to buy her one too.
customer_reviews.author: RO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike!
customer_reviews.text: Well made cruiser, very comfortable. I replaced the handlebars for under twenty bucks, didn't like how wide they were, otherwise this bike is great. The gearing's well spaced, seat's rather comfortable, it came mostly assembled and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comortable Beach Cruiser
customer_reviews.text: multiple likes about htis bike, first, the bike is way easy to assemble, light weight but well made and sturdy. I'm fortunate to live by the ocean and ride my sixthreezero on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna K.

customer_reviews.title: Defective pedals bust on day one.
customer_reviews.text: Don't push down too hard on the pedals or they'll break. Not saying a lot for 350+ dollar bike that the pedals break on day one.
customer_reviews.author: bagman29

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike, could be a smoother ride.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say it's a nice quality bike, BUT why doe it make so much noise? It squeaks when I pedal even though I put extra WD-40 on it. I feel the bearing is a little bumpy when I pedal hard and it makes a constant clicking noise when in gear which is pretty annoying when I just want to ride around at night silently. All in all it's a decent bike with some flaws, I wish it worked a little smoother though...
customer_reviews.author: GregK

customer_reviews.title: I'm Batman!!!
customer_reviews.text: So having purchased my wife a Teal sixthreezero Women's bike last week I had to have my own to be able to ride with her.Mine arrived yesterday and is Super Cool..........If Batman road a bicycle this would be the one. Sleek look with exceptional lines and a smooth yet powerful ride.
customer_reviews.author: AVS

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bike....great value and super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this bike on Amazon last week and love it. It is great for a larger person..I am 6-2. I almost bought a beach cruiser from a big box store before I took the time to look this one up on the web. So glad I took the time to research and find sixthreezero. Spend a little more for a true quality cruiser like this...you get craftsmanship and quality instructions given with this bike. Everything is top notch, and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M Bauer

customer_reviews.title: 100% perfect for husband
customer_reviews.text: 100% perfect for husband. Will add tire fenders. Cool look. Great for posture, on road or beach sand. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: BlueSea Iris

customer_reviews.title: Need a new rear wheel
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 years ago, garage kept . Ridden on Ocean City boardwalk exclusively. Over last 12 months 6 rear Spokes have broken, now I have a wobble in my rear wheel which is binding with my rear brake!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Bike
customer_reviews.text: Front wheel arrived warped! Had to have repaired at a local bike shop. Other than that, i like the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've ridden it and it's just cool. I have to get the woman's model
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for my 6'4 husband who hates bike riding because standard seat hurts his bony butt! This thing is a dream! Lightweight, no problem for his height, and just glides without effort. I've ridden it and it's just cool. I have to get the woman's model!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: All around awesome beach cruiser. I've owned many bikes and this is one of the most comfortable and efficient bikes I've ever ridden. Easy to put together and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike
customer_reviews.text: This is the definition of chill ride, and looks great too. Wanted a bike that I could ride to our town square at a pace to keep up with my 7 year old daughter, grab a cup of coffee, and tour the historic district of our town. Looked for size and price, and this bicycle hit all marks with ease. It oozes down the street, and has plenty of room for cup holders, baskets or any other accessory needed. Loving the ride, may love the 3 speed version, but this one speed looks sooo good without any cables or levers, just simple bicycle, nothing more, nothing less.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Bures

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy Riding Bike
customer_reviews.text: I set this up myself. It was easy to assemble, looks pretty cool and best yet, it rides very comfortably. It is a cruiser so if you are wanting a smooth and easy ride, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Smolket

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the heavy side, but cool!
customer_reviews.text: The bike, I mean. The bike came unassembled, but it was pretty easy to put together. It's sharp and large enough to fit me comfortably at 6'1" about 200lbs. First time taking it for a spin a few of the neighbors gave some compliments on the brightness of the orange and the cool beachy vibe.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beach Cruiser
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. It was so easy to put together. It’s very high quality and looks great. Very easy to add a lock attachment and a surfboard holder. Absolutely perfect bike for cruising around South Beach.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable bike.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bike. Rides smooth and really easy to assemble. Even came with touch up paint. It came with leather handle bar grips which I don’t really like but overall a great bike. Would buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Tejada

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent bike! It arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bike! It arrived fast, was easy to assemble, and rides great! Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a cruiser style men's bike.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this bike! It is well built using quality materials and easy to assemble. It rides smooth no matter if you bilke on country roads or asphalt. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Boge

customer_reviews.title: Nuce!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike for the price. I got it on a lightning deal and am happy with what I got.
customer_reviews.author: AZ13

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and sturdy. He says it was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this bike. It also travels well! Very comfy and sturdy. He says it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: carebear173

customer_reviews.title: ^supa sixthreezero bike^
customer_reviews.text: My sixthreezero bicycle arrived fast with free shippin. It was very easy to assemble only took abt 10 min. Very well made bicycle its rides reely well. It very easy to climb hills with very lil effort and its a single speed. A very smooth ride a reel solid bicycle. I reely like riding my bike I sum times ride it to work. I would highly recommend the sixthreezero bycycle!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dre raw

customer_reviews.title: Rides like a dream
customer_reviews.text: This bike was exactly what I was looking for. It's simple, understated, and solid. It was stupidly easy to assemble, and it rides beautifully. I was surprised by how smooth and quiet the ride is, in particular. You can barely hear the chain. The color is more of a pale silver than white, but it looks great. I'm very pleased and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Old school!!!
customer_reviews.text: The SixThreeZero In the Barrel is an awesome old school bike. It's simplicity is one of it's strongest assets. I'm a big fellow 6'1" tipping the scales at 260 and the laid back cruiser riding position is perfect! It was a blind purchase for me and I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: B Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike so far
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike so far, and assembles super easy in minutes. Really comfortable to ride, look forward to enjoying this for some time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike so far
customer_reviews.text: Great Bike so far. Had what I thought might be a problem but it turned out to be ok. Support was excellent and even offered to pay to have it fixed close to home which was unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Johnson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BIKE! GREAT COMPANY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is 6'3" and he says he loves it. Customer service and communication (from the owner no less!) second to none. Shipped super fast and my husband said from the time he opened the box until he was riding was about 30 minutes. Really looks good. Beachbikes, the company is a great business model. Bike is very smooth. Thanks Dustin!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Bertetta

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and was packaged well. Took about 15 minutes to assemble, tools were included which was nice. Bike is very comfortable and a smooth ride. I'm 6 feet tall and it's a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Merchant seaman

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bike, but...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8 and it was just about too big. If it was any bigger or me shorter I would hurt myself straddling it. It never would shift correctly so it was sent back. Looked great though.
customer_reviews.author: IBuy2MuchIt

customer_reviews.title: perfect for summer bike rides in the city .
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, hard to get seat just right. this bike will give you a work out due to only having one gear.
customer_reviews.author: Hussein J Yusuf

customer_reviews.title: The first time my son rode the bike the left ...
customer_reviews.text: The first time my son rode the bike the left pedal broke off however he rode the bike to school the next then it was stolen... The bike is also out of stock so I can’t get him a new one please help!
customer_reviews.author: lorri cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Easily put it together
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new 6-3-0... today ...Easily put it together, and hit the road...I'm 64 years old its the coolest easiest riding bike I have ever owned..The 3 speed gear ratios are perfect...Great Product...I should know because at my age I have probably owned over 20 bikes ...LUV IT
customer_reviews.author: brock robertson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good condition, Manufacturers box
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition, Manufacturers box. Easy to assemble. Good for 6'4" riders. Plenty of leg extension and upright ride. Solid cruiser. Great grips and seat- I could grab them forever. Definitely everything I was looking for in a cruiser.
customer_reviews.author: alicia b.

customer_reviews.title: Bought a blackout version for my boyfriend's bday and like it so much bought one for myself
customer_reviews.text: Bought a blackout version for my boyfriend's bday and like it so much bought one for myself! I did have the sixthreezero women's cruiser but doesnt eide as good as the "in the barrel". Happy with quick free shipping to Kauai!!! Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Duke

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our beach bike! The bike was easy to assemble, exactly what we expected it to look like and far exceeded our expectations in quality. What a great product! We will be purchasing additional bikes through this company for our entire family!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Great Bike! I'm big 6'5, 240lbs and I find this bike to be very comfortable. I use it as a beach cruiser at my beach house. Biggest problem I had is my Dad kept taking it out so I decided to purchase another one. Same model, same color. Grey, which looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Great "real" bike
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father in law and he couldn't be happier. We saw the reviews on the cheaper versions and didn't want the bike falling apart on him. He rides it daily and has had zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Moore

customer_reviews.title: He liked it alot and needed it but someone else liked ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is a huge highschooler and it supported him. He liked it alot and needed it but someone else liked it too and stole it from his backyard, chained to a post.
customer_reviews.author: Lavonne Halby

customer_reviews.title: If you want a cruiser this is the bike for you
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality bike My Parents have Electra townies I would say there just as nice Very comfortable shifts great Great Product
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kooy

customer_reviews.title: True Cruiser
customer_reviews.text: Bike is comfortable and well built. Only wish the sprocket was larger as you need to peddle pretty quick to get anywhere. If speed isn't important and you're good with just cruising short distances, bike is great.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: ... and I each purchased a beach cruiser and absolutely love it! It is heavy and I'm 5' but ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I each purchased a beach cruiser and absolutely love it! It is heavy and I'm 5' but still able to manage it.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bike and easy asssembly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike as a wedding gift for my groom and he absolutely loves it!! The first day he rode it he was getting compliments on its sleek look!! FYI - the bike comes disassembled with no instructions but it is easy put together. At one point my husband had an assembly question, gave the company called and the customer rep. was friendly and knowledgeable. All-in-all took less then 20 minutes to put together. Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Ride
customer_reviews.text: This bike is a smooth ride and overall a great beach cruiser. Assembly was easy to put together at home - I highly recommend this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait.
customer_reviews.text: It took several months for this bike to arrive, but it’s great. Definitely worth the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Long

customer_reviews.title: U WILL NOT BE DISSAPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: This is all you are looking for . It's rides smooth, can take hills , and can get up to 25-30 fast pedal. The handle bars make you feel like your flyin. Honestly Best Buy I have made in a while
customer_reviews.author: Monica Smith Dickens

customer_reviews.title: dependable
customer_reviews.text: easily assembled and dependable. Was used to ride across the Refinery from one location to the next in the 86 acre location
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is amazing! I spent a long time researching bikes before choosing this one. The vibrant, eye catching colors and retro design set this one apart. I kept coming back to it. The reviews of this bike definitely swayed me. All of the people attesting to the ease of assembly weren't lying! I'm definitely not mechanically inclined and I had no problems at all. It took less than 45 minutes (and 2 beers) from unpacking the box to rolling down the street! As I put it together on my porch, three people walking their dogs and stopped to admire it! Get yourself a sixthreezero now!
customer_reviews.author: A. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great Ride - all the envy of my friends - lol
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike and it arrived on time and was exactly what I was expecting. It will scratch somewhat easy so be careful during assembly and with tools in the garage that may fall on it because you're clumsy and drop stuff from the tool chest all the time. Great bike, great color. Looking forward to enjoying many, many rides up and down the Tampa waterfronts!
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Simmons

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY,  I REALLY LIKE THIS BIKE
customer_reviews.text: this is a cool bike, Im glad I made this purchase, Make sure you invest in a good, quality Lock.
customer_reviews.author: arthur

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 2 months and I .love it.. very easy to assemble . I wanted a bike I could ride with my dog running along side and this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My 6'-4" son thoroughly loves how this bike rides and fits his height. Bike came fast and in great shape. Very little to put together. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: jane lowe

product_meta.title: sixthreezero Men's in The Barrel 7-Speed Beach Cruiser Bicycle, Matte Black w/Black Seat/Grips, 26" Wheels/ 18" Frame
product_meta.description:
Color:Matte Black w/ Black Seat/Grip| Style:7-speed

Offering both killer looks and true comfort, the In The Barrel 26-inch beach cruiser bike for guys features a durable 18-inch extended frame in 1-, 3-, or 7-speed gear options. Ideal for taller guys, the In The Barrel's forward pedaling combined with an ideal crankset configuration give you the smoothest and easiest ride you could ask for. It features a cushy saddle and grips, plus a thicker top tube that combines both a mellow and rugged look.

Breeze through the city, by the beach, through your town, or up and down hills with three gear options to help you along the way. The 1-speed version is ideal for casual, recreational riding on flatter terrain. The 3-speed version features a Shimano Internal hub with Nexus shifter, giving you more gears for climbing hills and longer rides. The 7-speed version provides maximum versatility with its top-of-the-line seven-speed Shimano gear-shifting system, enabling you to go farther distances and enjoy more high intensity riding.

While designed for riders measuring 5-foot, 4-inches to 6-foot, 4-inches, the bike also works just as well for those of us who are a little more vertically challenged, with just a couple minor adjustments to the seat post and handlebars required to customize the fit.

No matter your height, the In The Barrel a nice, comfortable ride in a relaxed and open seating position. The thicker top tube and the all blacked-out parts and components on the matte black frame really make sure to give this bike the coveted mellow and rugged look.

Ride along with sixthreezero in the creation of a community of life enthusiasts who are passionate about living everyday to its fullest and enjoy the benefits of one of man's simplest and greatest mobility inventions, the bicycle. Ride Easy.
feature_bullets: Men's 26-inch cruiser bicycle with top-of-the-line 7-speed external derailleur with Nexus shifter offers maximum versatility for both beach and city riding
18-Inch extended steel frame with forward pedaling design ideal for taller riders
Shimano seven-speed hub with easy-to-use Nexus shifter offers maximum Versatility for a wide range of activities
Balloon tires and extra-wide comfort saddle with dual-springs absorbs bumps; front and rear handbrakes for easy stopping
Fits riders from 5 feet, 4 inches to 6 feet, 4 inches tall; comes 85 Percent Assembled
